text:
MEMOHANDUM
December 11, 1957
To* NAEB Board of Directors
cc: Harry J. Skomla
Proms Burton Paulu
Here Is a copy of the letter I sent to the JCET pursuant
to the resolution of the Board of Directors In St. Louis
meeting. In drawing this up, I was assisted by a special
ad hoc committee of Dick Hull (who moved both of the motions
Taken in St. Louis relative to the communication we were to
send to the JCET), and Vernon Bronson and Jack McBride (who
seconded the two resolutions). I also received the
assistance of Harry J. Skomla.
BPsds
